attributes.action: Force Companies to give Childless people 3 months paid leave after ten years service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are couples who don't have children either Thu health reasons or decision victimised against when it comes to leave. One lady at my place of work has had 5 kids in 7 years. that's 2 and a half years off paid leave. I would like the govenment to make it law that any person who has served 10 years of more and never taken maternity leave to receive 3 months paid leave either in one lump or over say 3 years. Male or Female.
